Slaves are workers who are forced and unwillingly work for Iban in the Underground Pass. In cages, they will be rotting away until fully transformed into a soulless, who guard the dungeons for Iban.


Contents

  • 1 Dialogue
  • 2 Changes
    • 2.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 3 Trivia

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The dialogue of one of the slaves references famous quotes from the tragedies Macbeth and Hamlet by William Shakespeare.
